stepAnswer: She put $15,000 into a CD and $35,000 in bonds.
stepTitle: Daniela invested a total of $50,000, some in a certificate of deposit (CD) and the remainder in bonds. The amount invested in bonds was $5000 more than twice the amount she put into the CD. How much did she invest in each account?
choices: She put $15,000 into a CD and $35,000 in bonds.
She put $15,000 into a CD and $35,000 in bonds.IShe put $20,000 into a CD and $15,000 in bonds.IShe put $10,000 into a CD and $10,000 in bonds.IShe put $20,000 into a CD and $30,000 in bonds.
